item.title: Hello World!
item.description: console.log("Hello world! =]"); This year started too good for me, with a lot of interviews with local and international companies since december, I’m working some projects and keeping focused in the work and my projects. I will init too study some other languages that is not from my main stack and try to keep a good knowledge on them doing projects of each language that I’m studying.

item.title: About
item.description: To make my personal projects and tools more documented, I created this blog with Go Hugo tool. I also think about to creating courses in the future, and everything involving tech that is within my stack.
